input_args.passage: 'George Albert Smith - Wikipedia | George Albert Smith Sr. (April 4, 1870 – April 4, 1951) was an American religious leader who served as the eighth president of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church)., American religious leader who served as the eighth president of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church)\nGeorge Albert Smith - Church History | George Albert Smith, Eighth President of the Church While employed in the Federal Land Office for Utah, he was called at the age of 33 to the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles. Despite fragile health and impaired eyesight, he had a distinguished career as a Church leader. He became President of the Church on May 21, 1945., Eighth President of the Church'
input_args.claim: 'From the given context, we can see that George Albert Smith was a significant leader in the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, serving as the eighth president.'
